title: FloppyCompanion
contentSecurityPolicy: default-src 'self' data: blob: {domain}; script-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' {domain}; script-src-elem * 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' {domain}; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' {domain}; style-src-elem 'self' 'unsafe-inline' {domain}; connect-src *; img-src *;
